name: Aguraki
description:
Aguraki is a space shooter in which your shield is your only hope to survive. 

Starships, asteroids and cosmic neutron waves will harass you endlessly. Shoot wisely to ennemies to grant your ship some energy and keep your shield active. If you are about to fail just trigger the bomb ... if you have enough energy to do it !

Do your best captain and engrave your name among the bests pilots in the online leaderboard.

---

You'll find the controls in the start menu and make sure to play fullscreen for better immersion

This game is a tribute to Ikaruga <3


First game ever made with the incredible Godot Engine. This game engine is an open source project which is totally free to use.

Music was done by Moresounds <<< Check this out

The online Leaderboard is handled by SilentWolf wich offers backend services for Godot engine for free !
